meanings.definition: A Japanese martial art involving grappling and striking techniques.
meanings.sent1: My friend practices jiujitsu at the local dojo.
meanings.sent2: Learning jiujitsu requires dedication and discipline.
meanings.sent3: During the jiujitsu class, I accidentally tripped over my own feet!
meanings.sent4: In the world of self-defense, jiujitsu is like a chess game with your body.
meanings.sent5: The sensei demonstrated the power of jiujitsu by effortlessly taking down his opponent.

meanings.definition: The practice or skill of jiujitsu.
meanings.sent1: His jiujitsu has improved significantly since he started training.
meanings.sent2: She teaches jiujitsu to children as a way to build confidence.
meanings.sent3: I never expected to see a cat trying to do jiujitsu moves on a mouse toy!
meanings.sent4: Her mastery of jiujitsu is like watching a graceful dance in action.
meanings.sent5: The dojo echoed with the sounds of students practicing jiujitsu techniques.
